module.name: mutation
module.description: I expect a new module that deals with 'mutation' or 'genome'. e.g. org.molgenis.genome Then I expect that NGS, xQTL and Mutation apps would share this between. Only in extreme cases I would choose to make different subclasses for each app.

entity.name: Mutation
entity.description: Part of an exon/intron that has its codon changed.

field.name: identifier
field.description: Automatically generated external identifier

field.name: mutationPosition
field.description: Position of the mutation including intron positions, e.g. 1234+5
field.label: Position

field.name: cdna_position
field.description: Position in bp inside of the cDNA sequence.
field.label: cDNA Position

field.name: gdna_position
field.description: Position in bp inside of the gDNA sequence.
field.label: gDNA Position

field.name: aa_position
field.description: Position in codon numbers of the changed amino acid
field.label: Amino acid position

field.name: length_
field.description: Length of the mutation.
field.label: Length

field.name: ntchange
field.description: Changed nucleotide(s) at given position.
field.label: Nt change

field.name: codonchange
field.description: Changed codon at given position.
field.label: Codon change

field.name: cdna_notation
field.description: cDNA notation of the mutation. Should be calculated automatically.
field.label: cDNA notation

field.name: gdna_notation
field.description: gDNA notation of the mutation. Should be calculated automatically.
field.label: gDNA notation

field.name: aa_notation
field.description: Amino acid notation of the mutation. Should be calculated automatically.
field.label: Amino acid notation

field.name: exon
field.description: Exon. Should be calculated automatically.
field.label: Exon

field.name: consequence
field.enum_options: [Altered splicing,Altered splicing -> alternative protein,Altered splicing -> premature termination codon,Delayed termination codon,In-frame deletion,In-frame duplication/insertion,In-frame exon skipping,Missense mutation,No initiation of transcription/translation,Premature termination codon,Unknown]
field.label: Consequence

field.name: inheritance
field.description: Is the mutation dominant or recessive?
field.label: Inheritance

field.name: reportedSNP
field.description: Reported as SNP? Should be calculated automatically.
field.label: Reported as SNP?

field.name: conservedAA
field.description: Conserved amino acid.? Should be calculated automatically.
field.label: Conserved amino acid?

field.name: effectOnSplicing
field.description: Predicted effect on splicing? Should be calculated automatically.
field.label: Effect on splicing?

field.name: founderMutation
field.description: Founder mutation?
field.label: Founder mutation?

field.name: population
field.description: Population if founder mutation.
field.label: Population
